channel.title: USA on Bird’s Eye View
channel.description: Recent content in USA on Bird’s Eye View

item.title: Chicago, USA
item.description: Chicago, USA Travel date April 2023 Check other cities in USA The Windy City Welcome to the Windy City, Chicago. Chicago is the 3rd largest city in the United States. Plan on spending at least a few days in Chicago to really absorb all the glory the city has to offer. TIP: Chicago is known for its freezing winters and its hot summers. Be sure to check the weather before making your trip!

item.title: San Diego, USA
item.description: San Diego, USA Travel date January 2021 Check other cities in USA Sunshine State Welcome to San Diego! San Diego is by far one of my favorite cities in the United States. If you’re like me, looking for an escape from the freezing winter weather, head on over to the West Coast. Enjoy delicious food, sunshine, great beaches, and interesting culture. San Diego Arriving in San Diego When arriving at the airport of San Diego, take the City Bus Public transit from the airport to downtown San Diego.
